item.title: Local Warming | Visualising Temperature Increase In Barbados
item.description: +++ [twitter] card = “summary_large_image” site = “@jamaalroach” creator = “@jamaalroach” title = Barbados Is Getting Hotter" description = “Visualising Temperature Increase In Barbados” image = “img/rays-cover.jpg” +++ Barbados is hot! It’s a tropical paradise in the Caribbean it’s always been hot, but these days, thanks to global warming, it is hotter than ever before. Exactly how hot is it? The devil went to hell to escape the heat in Barbados
